chronic sinusitis.context: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

deviated nasal septum.context: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

nasal obstruction.context: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

hypertrophied turbinates.context: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

septoplasty.context: After this was completed, a septoplasty was performed.

partial inferior middle turbinectomy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

KTP laser.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

sinus endoscopy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

maxillary antrostomies.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

removal of tissue.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

partial ethmoidectomy.context: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

Afrin nasal spray.context: The nose was prepped with Afrin nasal spray.

1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine.context: 1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in both sides of the septum and the mucoperichondrium.

sinus endoscope.context: The sinus endoscope at 25-degrees was then used to examine the nasal cavity in the left nasal cavity and staying lateral to the middle turbinate.

45-degree forceps.context: A 45-degree forceps then used to open up the maxillary sinus.

backbiting rongeur.context: This was enlarged with backbiting rongeur.

tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillar.context: The tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.

KTP laser at 10 watts.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

submucosal resection.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

inferior turbinates.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

middle turbinates.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

spur.context: The incision was made with a #15 blade Bard-Parker knife. The flap was then elevated, overlying the spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity.

Surgicel with antibiotic ointment.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.
